title: My CV
text:
Get to know more about me.

Bio
I am a 1st year PhD student from the Lyon Institute of Nanotechnology(INL). My thesis is about the characterization and modeling of the drift of noise in Single Photon Avalanche Diode(SPAD).


Education
2023-2026 : Ph.D in Microelectronics at INSA Lyon
Thesis : Origin and drift of noise in single photon avalanche diode
Key words : SPAD, Characterization, Noise ageing, Semiconductors devices
2018-2023 : Engineer diploma from INSA Lyon
Electrical engineer specialized in Integrated Electronics Systems
2018 : Baccalaureate with Honors from Hanoi Amsterdam High school, Hanoi, Vietnam


Experience
2023-2026 : Ph.D candidate

Simulation of the behavior of the SPAD via Sentaurus TCAD
Characterization and Analisis of the SPAD before and after apply stress

Feb 2023 - Jul 2023 : Embedded systems intern at Cardiags
Design of a microprogrammed device for physiological data acquisition
Key words : MSP programming, C++, Bluetooth Low Energy
Feb 2022 - Jul 2022 : R&D Engineer Junior at LGEF
Design and characterization of piezoelectrics sensors applied in aeronautics
Key words : Signal processing, Sensors design, Wireless connection


Skills

IT


MS Offices(Excel, PPT, Word)
Programming : Python, JAVA, C++, HTML, CSS, R, VHDL
Simulation : Matlab, Simulink, MPLab


Electronics


CAO : Altium, Cadence
Simulation : Sentaurus Synopsys
